about_the_game:
Welcome to Rootwood Ranch, the ultimate farming simulation experience! Build your dream farm on a vast 8x8 km island, either solo or with friends. Immerse yourself in the serene countryside as you plant crops, raise livestock, and expand your homestead.

Explore the bustling town, where you can shop for vehicles, tools, and building materials. Visit cafes and stores to sell your farm's produce or grab a bite to eat. Venture into the dense forests to hunt wildlife, gather resources, and even encounter rare animals.

Rootwood Ranch offers a wide array of activities and features:

Farm Management: Grow crops, take care of animals, and manage your farm's resources.
Building & Crafting: Construct barns, houses, and other structures. Use harvested wood to create planks and logs for building.
Vehicles: Purchase and drive various vehicles, including trucks and tractors, to help with farming and transportation.
Economy: Trade your goods in town, sell meat and skins from hunted animals, and manage your finances to grow your farming empire.
Multiplayer: Join forces with friends to build and manage your farm together.
Experience the joy of farm life with detailed graphics and a rich, immersive environment. Whether you're tending to your crops, exploring the wilderness, or expanding your farmhouse, Rootwood Ranch promises endless fun and adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains scenes of animal killing and butchering, as well as PvP (player versus player) combat with violent elements. Players can engage in combat encounters using rifles, leading to bloody and gory scenes. The game also features scenes of butchering killed animals to gather resources. This content may be disturbing to some players, especially those sensitive to violent scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12
  • VR Support: No
